title: Failed to generate Java classes from proto files
body:
### Describe the bug

From version 3.8.3 to version 3.9.x, an error is occurring when generating/compiling classes from .proto files.

### Expected behavior

Generate and compile classes with .proto files.

### Actual behavior

```
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.9.3:dev (default-cli) on project code-with-quarkus: Quarkus code generation phase has failed: InvocationTargetException: Failed to generate Java classes from proto files: [/Users/rodrigo/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/src/main/proto/hello.proto] to /Users/rodrigo/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/target/generated-sources/grpc with command /Users/rodrigo/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/target/com.google.protobuf-protoc-osx-x86_64-exe -I=/Users/rodrigo/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/src/main/proto -I=/Users/rodrigo/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/target/protoc-dependencies/a8021084782e76858f2824ee9cae13370b2a7e0a --plugin=protoc-gen-grpc=/Users/rodrigo/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/target/io.grpc-protoc-gen-grpc-java-osx-x86_64-exe --plugin=protoc-gen-q-grpc=/Users/rodrigo/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/target/quarkus-grpc10514800561735552649.sh --q-grpc_out=/Users/rodrigo/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/target/generated-sources/grpc --grpc_out=/Users/rodrigo/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/target/generated-sources/grpc --java_out=/Users/rodrigo/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/target/generated-sources/grpc /Users/rodrigo/Downloads/code-with-quarkus/src/main/proto/hello.proto
```

### How to Reproduce?

Using the "https://code.quarkus.io/" wizard, generate a Quarkus project, version 3.9.0 | 3.9.1 | 3.9.2 | 3.9.3, include the "quarkus-grpc" extension, download and run "./mvnw quarkus:dev".
- Build Tool: Maven
- Java Version: 17

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin MacBook-Pro-de-Rodrigo.local 19.6.0 Darwin Kernel Version 19.6.0: Tue Jun 21 21:18:39 PDT 2022; root:xnu-6153.141.66~1/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64

### Output of `java -version`

OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Homebrew (build 17.0.5+0, mixed mode, sharing)

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.9.0 | 3.9.1 | 3.9.2 | 3.9.3

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.9.6

### Additional information

_No response_
